title: THE BOB HOPE SHOW -- with Dean Martin and Martha Raye
description:
From April 1963 with guests Dean Martin in a TV semi-parody sketch of 
" The Beverly Hillbillies " and Martha Raye spoofing doctor shows, along with both getting a song in between. The last third of the hour is Bob's presentation of the Fourth Annual TV GUIDE Awards, with actors and producers of popular TV shows in the audience. Carol Burnett won for her special " An Evening with Carol Burnett ".

The filmed Pepsodent commercial features Bob with his "Critic's Choice" movie 
co-star Lucille Ball and longtime regular Jerry Colonna. Pepsodent had been sponsor of Bob Hope's radio show years earlier. This was very shortly before Chrysler began a long association with him on television
